Hydras continue tracking Cyclonus and the others
--------------------------------------------------
From: "Preston Carroll" <supercyclonus@...>
Sent: Friday, June 25, 2010 11:13 AM
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Subject: Re: The wrath of the Hydra

>> "Keep Cyclonu's signal in sight, be carefull and avoid any contact while 
>> I
>> arrive"repleid the predacon comander while he moved towards the last know
>> Cycolnu's location
>
> "Yes sir." Came Deepstryke's crsip reply, "It shall be as you
> command." he said as he signed off.
>
> The trip to Cyclonus' last known location takes Hydras, Iguanus,
> Inferno and and somewhat reluctant Fractyl into the tunnel that lead
> deep into the Earth. It was the same tunnel that Perceptor, Tuscon abd
> the other Maximals had taken during their escape.
>
> The tunnel was much as they had seen it. The approximately 10 feet
> wide with a little variance here and there. As Hydras moves further
> into the tunnels the light quickly disappears, the only light comming
> from whatever light Hydras or one of the others turns on. There walls
> are generally smooth, although there are a few marks along the walls
> as if something large and heavy had been through here recently. On the
> floor are the tire prints of a large vehicle that had evidently
> traveled down the path. From the size of the prints the vehicle was
> almost as wide as the tunnel itself, leaving only a foot or two
> clearance on each side. That vehicle must have had an excellent
> driver.
>
> As Hydras traveled he got to one point where he can see the obvious
> sings of battle, and then he sees another, this one filled with far
> more firepower than the first.
>
> Finally as Hydas continued his push foward, floowed still by Iguanus,
> Inferno and Fractyl, he can see up ahead the signs of a fire fight.
> Lights flash from up ahead, and the sounds of battle can be heard.
> Cyclonus' signal is clearly in the midst of it, as well as those of
> Insecticon and Bruticus-X. Also, in the battle with Cyclonus, Hydras
> can pick up reading of some sort of strange almost alien type of
> creature, and the odd thing is that the signature has bits of Autobot
> elements in it as well.
>
> So far Deepstryke, Phobia and Nightrazor have not arrives as they are
> still somewhat further back down the tunnel behind Hydras.
>
> (TAG)
>
> Preston
